catFacts.fact: Cats have five toes on their front paws, but only four on their back paws.
Cats sleep for an average of 13-16 hours a day.
Cats use their whiskers to measure gaps and spaces to check if they can fit through them.
Cats' whiskers are roughly as wide as their body.
A group of cats is called a clowder, and a litter of kittens is called a kindle.
